name: box-node-cognito-token-exchange-lambda-sample
description: This lambda extracts the box user id from Cognito using the Cognito token. Then generate app user token from Box and returns the token.

scripts.zip: zip -rMM box-node-cognito-token-exchange-lambda-sample index.js aws-service.js box-manager.js cognito-manager.js private_key.pem node_modules

author: Box <oss@box.com>
